title: Vaanam Enna Lyrics Vetri Vizha
stanzas: <div>Vaanam Enna Lyrics Vetri Vizha

Vaanam enna keezhirukku
boomi enna melirukku
sorgamlogam
pakkam vandhathu

dheva gaanam paada paada
thaenum palum oda oda
thendral vandhu
 thaalam thattudhu.

aattamum paattamum
hey nainaa
oattamum thullalum.
hoi hoinaa
yedho ..vegam.. vandhirukka

Vaanam enna keezhirukku
boomi enna melirukku
sorgamlogam
pakkam vandhathu

dheva gaanam paada paada
thaenum palum oda oda
thendral vandhu
 thaalam thattudhu.

kaalai maaai raathiri
kattil meedhu paaiviri
kaama rooba sundhari
kodi kodi sangathi

vaadaa nanbane
velai nalla velaithaan
velai vandhapin veru
enna velaithaan

maalai malligaithaan
solai vandinanthaan
manjal thanthiramthaan
podu mandhiramthaan

neram kaalam
romba romba saadhagam
serum ingae
chinna pennin jaadhagam
vaa vaa kadhal paattedukka.

Vaanam enna keezhirukku
boomi enna melirukku
sorgamlogam
pakkam vandhathu

dheva gaanam paada paada
thaenum palum oda oda
thendral vandhu
 thaalam thattudhu.

aattamum paattamum
hey nainaa
oattamum thullalum.
hoi hoinaa
yedho ..vegam.. vandhirukka

Vaanam enna keezhirukku
boomi enna melirukku
sorgamlogam
pakkam vandhathu

dheva gaanam paada paada
thaenum palum oda oda
thendral vandhu
 thaalam thattudhu.

theeyai pola kaaiyudhu
kanalai pola kodhikkuthu
ambu onnu pattadhu
aadhi andham sutthadhu

yedho niyaabagam
meththa onnu thaeduthu.
ennam aayiram rekkai
katti oaduthu.

aagaa noolidaithaan
aalai kolluthappaa
neela thamaraithaan
nenjai alluthappaa

vaadaa raja
vaalibathai kaattu nee
veenai ingae
kaieduthu meettu nee
vaa vaa kadhal paattedukka

Vaanam enna keezhirukku
boomi enna melirukku
sorgamlogam
pakkam vandhathu

dheva gaanam paada paada
thaenum palum oda oda
thendral vandhu
 thaalam thattudhu.

aattamum paattamum
hey nainaa
oattamum thullalum.
hoi hoinaa
yedho ..vegam.. vandhirukka

Vaanam enna keezhirukku
boomi enna melirukku
sorgamlogam
pakkam vandhathu

dheva gaanam paada paada
thaenum palum oda oda
thendral vandhu
 thaalam thattudhu.
